item.title: Using Github Actions to Automate My Second Brain
item.description:
Building a Second Brain with Notion

For the past year I have been building my second brain1 in Notion. I use Notion daily to store web clippings, research and meeting notes for work, the books I read, book highlights2 and notes, and even the upcoming movies and TV shows that I want to watch. The Notion database provides a great user experience for capturing, filtering and sorting lists of data like that.
